document.full_text: the panel of eight women and four men walked out of the jury room looking spent, with drooping shoulders and blank looks on their faces, as they again failed to render a verdict.
document.title: bonds jury hears about injection again but reaches no verdict
lines_and_colors: the panel of eight women and four men walked out of the jury room looking spent, with drooping shoulders and blank looks on their faces, as they again failed to render a verdict.
